titles.title: It Is Not By Might; And Not By Power

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It is not by might, and not by power,
But by My Spirit, saith the Lord.
It is not by might, and not by power,
But by My Spirit, saith the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When thou goest through the waters,
When thou goest through the fire,
Then I will be there with thee.
The flame shall not hurt thee,
The river shall not overflow thee,
For I will be there with thee.
